pid-59.disclaimer_en: Please note that this tool is intended as general guidance only and not as legal or financial advice. Please consider seeking the services of a lawyer and accountant before making a final decision.
pid-59.disclaimer_fr: Please note that this tool is intended as general guidance only and not as legal or financial advice. Please consider seeking the services of a lawyer and accountant before making a final decision.(FR)

cat-1.context_en: If you intend to operate outside British Columbia it may make sense to incorporate federally. Note: there may be other professional or industry requirements if you intend to operate in other jurisdictions.
cat-1.context_fr: If you intend to operate outside British Columbia it may make sense to incorporate federally. Note: there may be other professional or industry requirements if you intend to operate in other jurisdictions.(FR)

1b.b_en: Primarily British Columbia, but we may expand nationally.
1b.b_fr: Primarily British Columbia, but we may expand nationally.(FR)
